description.value: Note: If this weapon would do damage to an enemy, it only does 1 damage. Those damaged by the weapon must make a -20 Toughness Test or fall comatose for 1d10 x 3 minutes, or 1d5 hours if failed by 3+ DoF. Its Ammo is Scarce, and each dart costs 8 Thrones.
